Sentencas: Several transition metal carbides were examined as anodes for the internal direct-oxidation of carbon in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: AN INVESTIGATION OF ANODES FOR DIRECT-OXIDATION OF CARBON IN SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: Observed values of open-circuit voltage of carbide anode cells were found to be in the same order as the oxygen potentials calculated for the respective metal carbide/metal oxide equilibrium.
Titulo: AN INVESTIGATION OF ANODES FOR DIRECT-OXIDATION OF CARBON IN SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: All the carbide anodes investigated showed higher performance in polarization curves than graphite.
Titulo: AN INVESTIGATION OF ANODES FOR DIRECT-OXIDATION OF CARBON IN SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: The chemical stability of anodes under a polarized condition was estimated by thermochemical calculations.
Titulo: AN INVESTIGATION OF ANODES FOR DIRECT-OXIDATION OF CARBON IN SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: Based on this calculation and outlet gas analysis from the cells, a VC anode was able to activate carbon, while ZrC and TiC anodes were not able to activate carbon due to the oxidation of carbides.
Titulo: AN INVESTIGATION OF ANODES FOR DIRECT-OXIDATION OF CARBON IN SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: The redox reaction of anodes plays an important role for activating carbon in carbide anode cells.
Titulo: AN INVESTIGATION OF ANODES FOR DIRECT-OXIDATION OF CARBON IN SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS
